text: Ozan: Implement RRT Algorithm .Implement Pedestrian Prediction Algorithm. Integrate IMU Data Fusion. Validate Accuracy in Simulated Indoor Environments. Optimize Bug Algorithm. Optimize Collision Checking.

Eren: Develop Path Smoothing Post-Avoidance. Develop Potential Fields Method. Optimize Real-Time Performance. Develop Pose Graph Optimization. Design Traffic Light Compliance Module. Optimize A* Algorithm for Urban Environments.

Cagatay: Integrate Hybrid A*/RRT Planner. Develop Emergency Stopping Mechanism. Implement ORB-SLAM Algorithm. Develop Loop Closure Detection. Integrate Sensor Fusion for Obstacle Detection. Validate Algorithm Performance in Simulations.
